name: Project Build (Ryan Vuong, Kenzie MacDougal, Pambrish)
name_original: Project Build (Ryan Vuong, Kenzie MacDougal, Pambrish)
description:
Build structures to protect your cores from incoming enemies! Watch out, more enemies will spawn as the game progresses and you will be forced to place down more cores. Make sure your structures are airtight because if just one of your cores are destroyed, you lose the game.

Credits:

Nick Pavlosky

Sudarshan Seshadri

Ryan Vuong

Kenzie Macdougal

Preksha Ambrish
